component.description: Schedule provides an Outlook Calendar, iCal like JSF component to manage events. Schedule is highly customizable featuring various views (month, day, week), built-in I18N, drag-drop, resize, customizable event dialog and skinning.
component.attributes:
&standard_uicomponent_attributes; &widget_var_attribute;
value false org.primefaces.model.ScheduleModel An org.primefaces.model.ScheduleModel instance representing the backed model.
locale false java.lang.Object Locale for localization, can be String or a java.util.Locale instance.
aspectRatio false java.lang.Double java.lang.Double.MIN_VALUE Ratio of calendar width to height, higher the value shorter the height is.
view false java.lang.String month The view type to use, possible values are 'month', 'agendaDay', 'agendaWeek', 'basicWeek', 'basicDay'. Default is month.
initialDate false java.lang.Object The initial date that is used when schedule loads. If ommitted, the schedule starts on the current date.
showWeekends false java.lang.Boolean true Specifies inclusion Saturday/Sunday columns in any of the views. Default is true.
style false java.lang.String Style of the main container element of schedule.
styleClass false java.lang.String Style class of the main container element of schedule.
draggable false java.lang.Boolean true When true, events are draggable. Default is true.
resizable false java.lang.Boolean true When true, events are resizable. Default is true.
showHeader false java.lang.Boolean true Specifies visibility of header content. Default is true.
leftHeaderTemplate false java.lang.String prev,next today Content of left side of header. Default is "prev, next today"
centerHeaderTemplate false java.lang.String title Content of center of header. Default is title.
rightHeaderTemplate false java.lang.String month,agendaWeek,agendaDay Content of right side of header. Default is "month, agendaWeek, agendaDay"
allDaySlot false java.lang.Boolean true Determines if all-day slot will be displayed in agendaWeek or agendaDay views. Default is true.
slotDuration false java.lang.String 00:30:00 The frequency for displaying time slots. Default is 00:30:00.
slotMinutes false java.lang.Integer 30 Interval in minutes in an hour to create a slot. Default is 30.
scrollTime false java.lang.String 06:00:00 Determines how far down the scroll pane is initially scrolled down. Default is 06:00:00.
firstHour false java.lang.Integer 6 First hour to display in day view. Default is 6.
minTime false java.lang.String Minimum time to display in a day view. Default is 00:00:00.
maxTime false java.lang.String Maximum time to display in a day view. Default is 24:00:00.
axisFormat false java.lang.String Determines the time-text that will be displayed on the vertical axis of the agenda views.
timeFormat false java.lang.String Determines the time-text that will be displayed on each event.
columnFormat false java.lang.String Format for column headers.
timeZone false java.lang.Object String or a java.util.TimeZone instance to specify the timezone used for date conversion to ISO_8601 format, defaults to "UTC".
clientTimeZone false java.lang.String Timezone to define how to interpret the dates at browser. Valid values are "false", "local", "UTC" and ids like "America/Chicago".
ignoreTimezone false java.lang.Boolean true When parsing dates, whether UTC offsets should be ignored while processing event data. Default is true
tooltip false java.lang.Boolean false Displays description of events on a tooltip, default value is false.
showWeekNumbers false java.lang.Boolean false Display week numbers in schedule.
extender false java.lang.String Name of javascript function to extend the options of the underlying fullcalendar plugin.
displayEventEnd false java.lang.String Whether or not to display an event's end time text when it is rendered on the calendar. Value can be a boolean to globally configure for all views or a comma separated list such as "month:false,basicWeek:true" to configure per view.
